a.n: David Murray Quartet feat. Saul Williams - Moods

p.k: David Murray researched the relationship between avant-garde and tradition in a way that makes him stand out among his saxophonist peers. For his latest project, Murray is joined by rapper, singer, actor and poet Saul Williams.
p.d: Since its opening in 1992, jazz club Moods has developed into one of Zurich's largest and most prominent cultural venues. At the same time, it has become one of Europe's prominent jazz clubs which today enjoys a well-deserved worldwide reputation among musicians and critics. The venue books a large variety of genres, ranging from jazz and soul to electronic and international music. David Murray researched the relationship between avant-garde and tradition in a way that makes him stand out among his saxophonist peers. For his latest project, Murray is joined by rapper, singer, actor and poet Saul Williams.
